author: Special Correspondent
text:
Tamil Maanila Congress (TMC) on Monday drew the attention of Highways Department to the absence of service roads at vital stretches along Salem-Coimbatore National Highway.

Delegation

A delegation of the party leaders submitted a petition to the district administration stating that the laying of service roads was not complete at Bhavani, Chithode and Perundurai along the Highway.

Due to the absence of service roads, the local public using the four-lane road were exposed to grave risks, the petition submitted to the officials said.
title: TMC seeks service roads
